cmp: 车 (car/a vehicle/machine/to shape with a lathe, vehicle on land)
展 (to use/to spread out/to postpone/to unfold)
mng: roll over on side, turn half over

exm.mng: to toss about in bed, from person to person, indirectly, to wander
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)
to roll over, to run over
to toss and turn in one’s bed, unable to sleep (idiom)
